title: Selective Amnesia
data:
{{Obsolete}}

[[Selective Amnesia]] was a level 4 [[Enchantments]] spell which allowed the caster to forget one memorized spell, reclaiming [[MP]] in the process.

This effect was identical to that of a [[scroll of amnesia]] or the [[Sif Muna]] Forget Spells At Will ability.

==History==
Selective Amnesia was removed in [[0.8]].
